displayName.name: Display name
displayName.hint: Toggle the display of the participant's name. When off, Unknown will be displayed instead of the name.

portraitScale.name: Portrait scale
portraitScale.hint: The scale of the portrait. By default, a scale of 1 will fill the container. Lower values will decrease the size and add padding, while higher values will zoom the picture in.

vertical.name: Vertical Portrait Anchor
vertical.hint: The vertical point which is considered the origin from which the image will begin to display.

horizontal.name: Horizontal Portrait Anchor
horizontal.hint: The horizontal point which is considered the origin from which the image will begin to display.

CHUD.strings.name: Name

linkedJournal.name: Linked Journal
linkedJournal.hint: Journal entry that will be linked to the conversation participant.

linkedActor.name: Linked Actor
linkedActor.hint: Actor that will be linked to the conversation participant.

conversationBackground.name: Conversation Background
conversationBackground.hint: An image that will be displayed as the background of this conversation. If no image is selected, a dark semi-transparent background will be shown instead.

CHUD.strings.noParticipantsInList: Conversation has no participants. Try adding some. (Drag and drop is supported)
CHUD.strings.unsavedChangesHint: The conversation contains unsaved changes. Do you wish to save them?
CHUD.strings.dropItem: Drop item here to add it to the conversation
CHUD.strings.dropFaction: Drop faction here to add it to the participant
CHUD.strings.holdControl: Hold CTRL to replace current participants

sceneConversation.name: Scene Conversation
sceneConversation.hint: A linked conversation that will activate automatically whenever the scene is activated.

sceneConversationVisibilityOff.name: Conversation Visibility Off
sceneConversationVisibilityOff.hint: Set whether or not to start the conversation with the visibility off. When unchecked, the conversation will start as visible.

excludeFromBeingPulled.name: Exclude From Being Pulled
excludeFromBeingPulled.hint: Toggle whether not not token will be displayed on the list of actors being pulled into an active conversation.

linkedConversation.name: Linked Conversation
linkedConversation.hint: A linked conversation that will be used whenever the token is being pulled into an active conversation.

onCloseActiveConversation.title: Are you sure?
onCloseActiveConversation.content: Are you sure you want to close this conversation? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

onRemoveParticipant.title: Are you sure?
onRemoveParticipant.content: Are you sure you want to remove this participant from the currently active conversation?

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.content: The conversation contains unsaved changes. Do you wish to save them?

factionSelector.name: Faction Selector
factionSelector.hint: Create a new faction or select an already existing one.

displayFaction.name: Display Faction
displayFaction.hint: Toggle the display of the faction to which the participant belongs to.

displayFactionBanner.name: Display Banner
displayFactionBanner.hint: Toggle the display of a banner that appears in the background.

portraitStyle.name: Portrait Style
portraitStyle.hint: This option determines the orientation and style in which the portraits of the active participants will be displayed.

portraitAnchorVertical.name: Portrait Anchor - Vertical
portraitAnchorVertical.hint: The vertical anchor point of reference from which the portrait will begin to pe displayed. For example, with the Top option selected, the upper section of the portrait will always be displayed.

portraitAnchorHorizontal.name: Portrait Anchor - Horizontal
portraitAnchorHorizontal.hint: The horizontal anchor point of reference from which the portrait will begin to pe displayed. For example, with the Left option selected, the leftmost section of the portrait will always be displayed.

displayAllParticipantsToPlayers.name: Display Participants List
displayAllParticipantsToPlayers.hint: Toggle whether or not to display the list of all the conversation participants to the players. The GM will still be able to see this list.

displayNoParticipantBox.name: Show No Active Participant UI
displayNoParticipantBox.hint: Toggle whether or not to display the container informing the users that there is currently no actively speaking participant. If off, nothing will be shown instead.

enableSpeakAs.name: Enable Speak As
enableSpeakAs.hint: Toggle the Speak As feature on or off. By default, the feature is on, but if you do not use it and do not want an extra button to appear, you can toggle it off.

enableMinimize.name: Enable Minimize
enableMinimize.hint: Toggle the Minimize feature on or off. By default, the feature is on as it allows users to interact with the map while a conversation is active and visible. If you do not want this behavior, you can toggle the feature off.

keepMinimize.name: Remember Minimization
keepMinimize.hint: Remember minimization status between different conversations. By default, the feature is off so that every new conversation will start maximized. Enable this feature to have new conversations pick up the previous minimization state. Minimization state resets on page reload.

enableSceneConversations.name: Enable Scene Conversations
enableSceneConversations.hint: Toggle the Scene Conversation feature on or off. By default, the feature is on and it allows users to link a conversation to a scene and when the scene is activated the conversation will open automatically. The conversation selector can be found on the Ambience tab of the Scene Config Sheet. If you do not want this behavior, you can toggle the feature off.

blurAmount.name: Blur Amount
blurAmount.hint: The amount of blur (in pixels) that will be applied to the background when a conversation is active. An amount of zero pixels will disable the background blur completely.

activeParticipantFontSize.name: Participant Font Size
activeParticipantFontSize.hint: This option determines the size of the font used to display the name of the currently active participant.

activeParticipantFactionFontSize.name: Participant Faction Font Size
activeParticipantFactionFontSize.hint: This option determines the size of the font used to display the name of the faction to which the currently active participant belongs to.

rpgUiFix.name: Enable custom UI fix
rpgUiFix.hint: If you are using a module that changes the look of the UI and you are experiencing an issue which makes the sidebar overlap the conversation interface or the control buttons, enabling this feature should fix the issues.
